data_table.description: Medical History Form, Exam 1. Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: MHXAFLAG
variable.description: MHXAFLAG [Medical History Form] [Medical History Form, exam 1]

variable.name: MHXACY
variable.description: Contact year [1] [Medical History Form, exam 1]

variable.name: MHXA02
variable.description: [Medical care]. How often do you have a routine physical exam, not for a particular illness, but for a general checkup? Q2 [Medical History Form, exam 1]
variable.value: At least once every five years
Less than once every five years
Do not have routine physical examinations

variable.name: MHXA03
variable.description: [Medical care]. Do you have health insurance? Q3 [Medical History Form, exam 1]

variable.name: MHXA04
variable.description: [Chest pain on effort]. Chest pain or discomfort? Q4 [Medical History Form, exam 1]

variable.name: MHXA05
variable.description: [Chest pain on effort]. Do you get it when you walk uphill or hurry? Q5 [Medical History Form, exam 1]

variable.name: MHXA06
variable.description: [Chest pain on effort]. Do you get it when you walk at an ordinary pace on the level? Q6 [Medical History Form, exam 1]

variable.name: MHXA07
variable.description: [Chest pain on effort]. What do you do if you get it while you are walking? Q7 [Medical History Form, exam 1]

variable.name: MHXA08
variable.description: [Chest pain on effort]. If you stand still what happens to it? Q8 [Medical History Form, exam 1]

variable.name: MHXA09
variable.description: [Chest pain on effort]. How soon? Q9 [Medical History Form, exam 1]

variable.name: MHXA10A
variable.description: [Chest pain on effort]. Will you show me where it was? Sternum (upper or middle) Q10a [Medical History Form, exam 1]

variable.name: MHXA10B
variable.description: [Chest pain on effort]. Will you show me where it was? Sternum (lower) Q10b [Medical History Form, exam 1]

variable.name: MHXA10C
variable.description: [Chest pain on effort]. Will you show me where it was? Left anterior chest Q10c [Medical History Form, exam 1]

variable.name: MHXA10D
variable.description: [Chest pain on effort]. Will you show me where it was? Left arm Q10d [Medical History Form, exam 1]

variable.name: MHXA10E
variable.description: [Chest pain on effort]. Will you show me where it was? Other Q10e [Medical History Form, exam 1]

variable.name: MHXA10F
variable.description: [Chest pain on effort]. Location of Q10e other chest pain Q10f [Medical History Form, exam 1]

variable.name: MHXA11
variable.description: [Chest pain on effort]. Chest pain anywhere else? Q11 [Medical History Form, exam 1]

variable.name: MHXA12
variable.description: [Chest pain on effort]. Did you see a doctor because of this pain or discomfort? Q12 [Medical History Form, exam 1]

variable.name: MHXA13
variable.description: [Chest pain on effort]. Doctor diagnosis of chest pain. Q13 [Medical History Form, exam 1]

variable.name: MHXA14
variable.description: [Chest pain on effort]. Hospitalized for this chest pain? Q14 [Medical History Form, exam 1]

variable.name: MHXA15
variable.description: [Chest pain on effort]. How long ago did you start getting this pain? Q15 [Medical History Form, exam 1]

variable.name: MHXA16
variable.description: [Chest pain on effort]. Within the past 2 months, has your chest discomfort occurred more often? Q16 [Medical History Form, exam 1]

variable.name: MHXA17
variable.description: [Chest pain on effort]. Has it occurred at least twice as often as before? Q17 [Medical History Form, exam 1]

variable.name: MHXA18
variable.description: [Chest pain on effort]. Within the past 2 months, has the pain become more severe? Q18 [Medical History Form, exam 1]

variable.name: MHXA19
variable.description: [Chest pain on effort]. Within the past 2 months, has the pain lasted longer when it occurs? Q19 [Medical History Form, exam 1]

variable.name: MHXA20
variable.description: [Chest pain on effort]. Use nitroglycerin to relieve the pain? Q20 [Medical History Form, exam 1]

variable.name: MHXA21
variable.description: [Chest pain on effort]. Within the past 2 months, has the pain required more nitroglycerin to relieve it? Q21 [Medical History Form, exam 1]

variable.name: MHXA22
variable.description: [Chest pain on effort]. Within the past 2 months have you started getting the pain with less exertion? Q22 [Medical History Form, exam 1]

variable.name: MHXA23
variable.description: [Chest pain on effort]. Within the past 2 months, have you started getting the pain when sitting still? Q23 [Medical History Form, exam 1]

variable.name: MHXA24
variable.description: [Chest pain on effort]. Within the past 2 months, have you started getting the pain when sleeping? Q24 [Medical History Form, exam 1]

variable.name: MHXA25
variable.description: [Possible infraction]. Have you ever had a severe pain across the front of your chest lasting for an hour or more? Q25 [Medical History Form, exam 1]

variable.name: MHXA26
variable.description: [Possible infraction]. See a doctor for Q25 chest pain? Q26 [Medical History Form, exam 1]

variable.name: MHXA27
variable.description: [Possible infraction]. Doctor diagnosis of Q25 chest pain. Q27 [Medical History Form, exam 1]

variable.name: MHXA28
variable.description: [Possible infraction]. Have you ever had a heart attack for which you were hospitalized one week or more? Q28 [Medical History Form, exam 1]

variable.name: MHXA29
variable.description: [Possible infraction]. Number of Q28 [have you ever had a heart attack for which you were hospitalized on week or more?] type heart attacks. Q29 [Medical History Form, exam 1]

variable.name: MHXA30
variable.description: [Possible infraction]. Age at first heart attack. Q30 [Medical History Form, exam 1]

variable.name: MHXA31
variable.description: [Possible infraction]. Have you ever had ECG taken during exercise? Q31 [Medical History Form, exam 1]

variable.name: MHXA32
variable.description: [Possible infraction]. Have you ever had ECG taken during exercise? Results Q32 [Medical History Form, exam 1]

variable.name: MHXA33
variable.description: [Intermittent claudication]. Leg pain while walking? Q33 [Medical History Form, exam 1]

variable.name: MHXA34
variable.description: [Intermittent claudication]. Leg pain begins when standing still or sitting? Q34 [Medical History Form, exam 1]

variable.name: MHXA35
variable.description: [Intermittent claudication]. Area of leg pain Q35 [Medical History Form, exam 1]

variable.name: MHXA36
variable.description: [Intermittent claudication]. Leg pain if you walk uphill or hurry? Q36 [Medical History Form, exam 1]

variable.name: MHXA37
variable.description: [Intermittent claudication]. Leg pain walking at ordinary pace on the level? Q37 [Medical History Form, exam 1]

variable.name: MHXA38
variable.description: [Intermittent claudication]. Leg pain ever disappear while walking? Q38 [Medical History Form, exam 1]

variable.name: MHXA39
variable.description: [Intermittent claudication]. Reaction to leg pain when walking. Q39 [Medical History Form, exam 1]

variable.name: MHXA40
variable.description: [Intermittent claudication]. What happens to it if you stand still? Q40 [Medical History Form, exam 1]

variable.name: MHXA41
variable.description: [Intermittent claudication]. Time to leg pain relief. Q41 [Medical History Form, exam 1]

variable.name: MHXA42
variable.description: [Intermittent claudication]. Were you hospitalized for this problem in your legs? Q42 [Medical History Form, exam 1]

variable.name: MHXA43
variable.description: [Congestive heart failure]. Have you ever had to sleep on 2 or more pillows to help you breathe? Q43 [Medical History Form, exam 1]

variable.name: MHXA44
variable.description: [Congestive heart failure]. Breathing trouble ever wake you? Q44 [Medical History Form, exam 1]

variable.name: MHXA45
variable.description: [Congestive heart failure]. Ever had swelling of feet, or ankles (excluding pregnancy)? Q45 [Medical History Form, exam 1]

variable.name: MHXA46
variable.description: [Congestive heart failure]. Did it tend to come on during the day or go down overnight? Q46 [Medical History Form, exam 1]

variable.name: MHXA48
variable.description: [Vasectomy]. Males only: vasectomy? Q48 [Medical History Form, exam 1]

variable.name: MHXA49
variable.description: [Vasectomy]. Age at vasectomy. Q49 [Medical History Form, exam 1]

variable.name: MHXA51
variable.description: [Administrative information]. Method of data collection. Q51 [Medical History Form, exam 1]

variable.name: MHXA01MON
variable.description: [Medical care]. How long has it been since you last saw a doctor for any reason? Time in months since last saw a doctor. Q1 [Medical History Form, exam 1]

variable.name: GWAS_ID
variable.description: ARIC subject ID [Medical History Form, exam 1]
